summary: Adds a book for in game reference to ingredient effects of items from Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=red]~*~ THIS MOD WILL NOT BE MADE FOR SSE UNTIL IT'S RELEVANT MOD CAOC IS! AT WHICH TIME I WILL UPLOAD IT MYSELF. NO ONE HAS PERMISSION TO UPLOAD THIS! ~*~

This is a warning now if you are using vanilla alchemy this book is not for you![/color][/b][/center]

[center]Greetings! Tired of having to run around tasting all your ingredients? Annoyed with wasting expensive materials to just learn the effects? Well look no further! This mod adds an in game reference book for all the effects of ingredients added with the Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul by kryptopyr. I'm sure most of you have by now seen the Alchemist Compendium book that was created for vanilla alchemy, while a wonderful mod it sadly does no cover the changes made when using the overhaul. Well now the lovers of CACO have a reference guide too!


[color=#ff0000][b]This mod is nexus only and is NOT to be uploaded anywhere else.[/b][/color]


[b][u]Where to find:[/u][/b]
Alchemist Shack - Outside on the table
[u]
[b]Requirements:[/b][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/?]Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul[/url]
- While this is not technically required, the book is pointless without it soooo yeah. -

[b][u]Changes:[/u][/b]
Fixed format errors.
Added a second book with missing ingredients.
(Apparently there's a text limit! If anyone knows how to work around that limit pm me.)

[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]
kryptopyr - Thank you for a fantastic overhaul![/center]
author: Ero

files.name: Small Fix to Layout plus Second Book with Missing Ingredients
files.fileName: Small Fix to Layout plus Second Book with Missing Ingredients-76725-1-1.rar
